title: Inception
description: A skilled thief uses dream-sharing technology to pull off intricate heists inside people's minds.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind bent on creating havoc and chaos in Gotham City.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of scientists and astronauts venture through a wormhole to find a new home for humanity.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The touching life story of Forrest Gump, a kind and simple man with extraordinary achievements.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker discovers the true nature of reality and joins a rebellion against oppressive forces.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge while fighting his way to freedom as a gladiator.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of hitmen, a boxer, and gangsters intertwine in a chaotic world of violence and redemption.

title: Avatar
description: A former Marine is sent to Pandora, where he joins the native Na'vi in their fight to protect their world.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over the years, forging a friendship that inspires hope and a quest for freedom.

title: The Godfather
description: The patriarch of a powerful crime family passes responsibility to his son during times of betrayal and turmoil.
